overview: As a result of the investigation, at least 32 contractual games were found. 15 teams from Russia took part in these friendly matches. More often, Krasnodar football club participated in such games. He has six matches on his account," said Kostin Stukan from the European Bureau of Investigation. Alexey Smolyaninov has made a documentary based on the leaks of the Football Leaks website, which reveals details of an unprecedented scandal with match-fixing in football.
title: Fake Judges
